title: Ward icon duplication (CLIENT)
body: This bug happens everytime I get into a lobby, when you go to select a ward the icon duplicate at random and you have multiple of the same wards for selection. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body: I used to play Match Run and I had a Pan and this was the last of me and the power cut off and then I came to know why I took Ban once my brother wanted me to lighten my block
This started happening to me during URF and I thought it was a joke.
Wait, you only have one copy of each ward? I have like 7 copies of each ward. I logged in last week for the patch and I was like "wtf is happening here"
Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and the team is working on a fix. :)
